plugin.name: grid
plugin._long: A plugin to position the windows in certain regions of the output.

option.name: duration
option._long: Sets the duration of the animation in milliseconds.

option.name: type
option._long: Sets the type of the animation.

option.name: slot_bl
option._long: Positions the window in the bottom left corner of the screen with the specified activator. The window takes 1/4 of the screen.

option.name: slot_b
option._long: Positions the window in the bottom edge of the screen with the specified activator. The window takes half of the screen.

option.name: slot_br
option._long: Positions the window in the bottom right corner of the screen with the specified activator. The window takes 1/4 of the screen.

option.name: slot_l
option._long: Positions the window in the left edge of the screen with the specified activator. The window takes half of the screen.

option.name: slot_c
option._long: Positions the window in the center of the screen with the specified activator. The window is maximized.

option.name: slot_r
option._long: Positions the window in the right edge of the screen with the specified activator. The window takes half of the screen.

option.name: slot_tl
option._long: Positions the window in the top left corner of the screen with the specified activator. The window takes 1/4 of the screen.

option.name: slot_t
option._long: Positions the window in the top edge of the screen with the specified activator. The window takes half of the screen.

option.name: slot_tr
option._long: Positions the window in the top right corner of the screen with the specified activator. The window takes 1/4 of the screen.

option.name: restore
option._long: Restores the window to its original size and position with the specified activator.
